attributes.action: Revoke the decision to ban pigeon,crow, Gull,Canada goose shooting as of 25/4/19
attributes.additional_details: If pigeon and crow shooting is banned then imagine the hassle of farmers applying for licences to kill the pigeon eating the crops that farmers provide for people like you and me and with crows eating other wildlife and there eggs there will be no control over it
attributes.background: The decision to ban pigeon and crow shooting is a huge mistake and is a bad cause that will effect the nature of good Wildlife and other wild birds
